commits.author: Jacob Carlborg
commits.summary: Fix the complete method for Ruby 2.x
commits.body:
Without this fix, the following error occurs:

```
`reopen': <STDOUT> can't change access mode from "w" to "r" (ArgumentError)
```

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Require the “track usage” helper from most/all ruby libraries

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Add helper to track which bundle items use which ruby libraries

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.body: None of the symbols in that file were used.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Let TextMate::UI use plist rubygem to parse property lists
commits.body: This should ensure that the library works with ruby 2.x.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Add pure ruby (XML) property list parser (and generator)
commits.body: This should work with both ruby 1.8.7 and 2.x, although latest version of this rubygem does not support ruby 1.x.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Use Dialog 2.x for TextMate::UI’s request string and request item

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Use Dialog 2.x for TextMate::UI’s alert, menu, and simple notification

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Use ruby’s shellwords in ui.rb instead of our own library

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Remove some commented lines from ui.rb

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Eliminate the global TM_DIALOG variable in ui.rb

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Harmonize how we require support files
commits.body: This is so that we can more easily track and refactor dependencies (without having to run the actual code).

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Update ‘find_app’ to universal binary (code signed and notarized)

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Replace Makefile with rave definition for building find_app
commits.body:
With universal builds, code signing, and notarization, it is not really practical to manually maintain a Makefile to do all these things.

I may add a Makefile generator to ‘rave’ so that we can include a (generated) Makefile. The reason I do not include the generated ‘build.ninja’ is because signing and notarization values are tied to developer ID, and ninja does not support reading values from environment variables.

commits.author: René Schwaiger
commits.body:
This commit adds CocoaDialog 3.0-beta7 to the bundle. This version of
the app should be identical to the one Matt Sephton (gingerbeardman)
uploaded [here][]. I only changed the name from `cocoaDialogNew.app` to
`CocoaDialog.app`.

This commit closes #31 and closes textmate/latex.tmbundle#181.

[here]: https://github.com/cocoadialog/cocoadialog/issues/108

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Change ERB trim mode from ‘%-<>’ to ‘%-’ to avoid warning
